snippet.title: DAWNMAKER - Steam Deckbuilders Fest Teaser
snippet.description:
A special teaser of Dawnmaker for Steam's Deckbuilders Fest, from March 25th to April 1st, 2024!

Dawnmaker is a turn-based city building and deckbuilding game. Raise luminous cities in a dark world, optimize your deck and create powerful combinations between buildings and cards! 

Play the demo now on Steam: https://s.team/a/2749100 
Or on Itch.io: https://arpentor.itch.io/dawnmaker-demo

And follow us on:
▶️ Twitter: https://twitter.com/ArpentorStudio
▶️ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Arpentor-Stu...
▶️ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/arpentorstu...

Sound by Pierre-François Renouf and music by Nicolas Cornil, from Studio Le Refuge - https://www.studiolerefuge.fr/
